metadata.title: Speech on the 400th Anniversary of the King James Bible

paragraphs.text: Over 400 years ago, King James VI of Scotland inherited the throne of England.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈəʊvə fɔː ˈhʌndrəd jɪəz əˈɡəʊ, kɪŋ ʤeɪmz ðə ˈsɪksθ əv ˈskɒtlənd ɪnˈhɛrɪtɪd ðə θrəʊn əv ˈɪŋɡlənd/

paragraphs.text: At a time when the Christian church was deeply divided.
paragraphs.ipa: /æt ə taɪm wɛn ðə ˈkrɪstʃən ʧɜːʧ wɒz ˈdiːpli dɪˈvaɪdɪd/

analysis.purpose: Set the scene for historical significance

paragraphs.text: Here at Hampton Court in 1604, he convened a conference of churchmen of all shades of opinion to discuss the future of Christianity in this country.
paragraphs.ipa: /hɪər æt ˈhæmptən kɔːt ɪn ˈsɪkstiːn ˈfɔː, hiː kənˈviːnd ə ˈkɒnfərəns əv ˈʧɜːʧmən əv ɔːl ʃeɪdz əv əˈpɪnjən tuː dɪsˈkʌs ðə ˈfjuːʧər əv ˌkrɪstiˈænɪti ɪn ðɪs ˈkʌntri/

analysis.purpose: Highlight efforts for unity in faith

paragraphs.text: The King agreed to commission a new translation of the Bible that was acceptable to all parties.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðə kɪŋ əˈɡriːd tuː kəˈmɪʃən ə njuː trænsˈleɪʃən əv ðə ˈbaɪbl ðæt wɒz əkˈsɛptəbl tuː ɔːl ˈpɑːtiz/

analysis.purpose: Emphasize the importance of inclusivity in religion

paragraphs.text: This was to become the King James or authorized Bible, which next year will be exactly four centuries old.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðɪs wɒz tuː bɪˈkʌm ðə kɪŋ ʤeɪmz ɔːr ˈɔːθəraɪzd ˈbaɪbl, wɪʧ nɛkst jɪər wɪl biː ɪɡˈzæktli fɔː ˈsɛnʧəriz əʊld/

paragraphs.text: Acknowledges a masterpiece of English prose and the most vivid translation of the scriptures.
paragraphs.ipa: /əkˈnɒlɪʤɪz ə ˈmɑːstəpiːs əv ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ prəʊz ænd ðə məʊst ˈvɪvɪd trænsˈleɪʃən əv ðə ˈskrɪpʧəz/

analysis.purpose: Praise the significance of the King James Bible

paragraphs.text: The glorious language of this Bible has survived the turbulence of history and given many of us the most widely recognised and beautiful descriptions of the birth of Jesus Christ which we celebrate today.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðə ˈɡlɔːriəs ˈlæŋɡwɪʤ əv ðɪs ˈbaɪbl hæz səˈvaɪvd ðə ˈtɜːbjʊləns əv ˈhɪstəri ænd ˈɡɪvən ˈmɛni əv ʌs ðə məʊst ˈwaɪdli ˈrɛkəɡnaɪzd ænd ˈbjuːtɪfʊl dɪsˈkrɪpʃənz əv ðə bɜːθ əv ˈʤiːzəs kraɪst wɪʧ wiː ˈsɛlɪbreɪt təˈdeɪ/

analysis.purpose: Connect the Bible's impact to Christmas

paragraphs.text: The King James Bible was a major cooperative endeavor that required the efforts of dozens of the day’s leading scholars.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðə kɪŋ ʤeɪmz ˈbaɪbl wɒz ə ˈmeɪʤər kəʊˈɒpərətɪv ɪnˈdɛvə ðæt rɪˈkwaɪəd ði ˈɛfəts əv ˈdʌzənz əv ðə deɪz ˈliːdɪŋ ˈskɒləz/

paragraphs.text: The whole enterprise was guided by an interest in reaching agreement for the wider benefit of the Christian Church and to bring harmony to the kingdoms of England and Scotland.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðə həʊl ˈɛntəpraɪz wɒz ˈɡaɪdɪd baɪ ən ˈɪntrɪst ɪn ˈriːʧɪŋ əˈɡriːmənt fɔː ðə ˈwaɪdə ˈbɛnɪfɪt əv ðə ˈkrɪstʃən ʧɜːʧ ænd tuː brɪŋ ˈhɑːməni tuː ðə ˈkɪŋdəmz əv ˈɪŋɡlənd ænd ˈskɒtlənd/

analysis.purpose: Emphasize goals of unity and harmony

paragraphs.text: 400 years later, it is as important as ever to build communities and create harmony.
paragraphs.ipa: /fɔː ˈhʌndrəd jɪəz ˈleɪtər, ɪt ɪz æz ɪmˈpɔːtənt æz ˈɛvə tuː bɪld kəˈmjuːnɪtiz ænd kriːˈeɪt ˈhɑːməni/

analysis.purpose: Reinforce the ongoing relevance of unity

paragraphs.text: And one of the most powerful ways of doing this is through sport and games.
paragraphs.ipa: /ænd wʌn əv ðə məʊst ˈpaʊəfʊl weɪz əv ˈduːɪŋ ðɪs ɪz θruː spɔːt ænd ɡeɪmz/

analysis.purpose: Introduce the theme of sport as a unifying force

paragraphs.text: During this past year of abundant sporting events, I have seen for myself just how important sport is in bringing people together from all backgrounds, from all walks of life and from all age groups.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈdjʊərɪŋ ðɪs pɑːst jɪər əv əˈbʌndənt ˈspɔːtɪŋ ɪˈvɛnts, aɪ hæv siːn fɔː maɪˈsɛlf ʤʌst haʊ ɪmˈpɔːtənt spɔːt ɪz ɪn ˈbrɪŋɪŋ ˈpiːpl təˈɡɛðə frɒm ɔːl ˈbækɡraʊndz, frɒm ɔːl wɔːks əv laɪf ænd frɒm ɔːl eɪʤ ɡruːps/

analysis.purpose: Share personal observations on sport's impact

paragraphs.text: In the parks of towns and cities and on village greens up and down the country, countless thousands of people every week give up their time to participate in sport and exercise of all sorts, also to encourage others to do so.
paragraphs.ipa: /ɪn ðə pɑːks əv taʊnz ænd ˈsɪtiz ænd ɒn ˈvɪlɪʤ ɡriːnz ʌp ænd daʊn ðə ˈkʌntri, ˈkaʊntlɪs ˈθaʊzəndz əv ˈpiːpl ˈɛvri wiːk ɡɪv ʌp ðeə taɪm tuː pɑːˈtɪsɪpeɪt ɪn spɔːt ænd ˈɛksəsaɪz əv ɔːl sɔːts, ˈɔːlsəʊ tuː ɪnˈkʌrɪʤ ˈʌðəz tuː duː səʊ/

paragraphs.text: These kinds of activity are common throughout the world and play a part in providing a different perspective on life.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðiːz kaɪndz əv ækˈtɪvɪti ɑː ˈkɒmən θruːˈaʊt ðə wɜːld ænd pleɪ ə pɑːt ɪn prəˈvaɪdɪŋ ə ˈdɪfrənt pəˈspɛktɪv ɒn laɪf/

paragraphs.text: Apart from developing physical fitness, sport and games can also teach vital social skills.
paragraphs.ipa: /əˈpɑːt frɒm dɪˈvɛləpɪŋ ˈfɪzɪkəl ˈfɪtnəs, spɔːt ænd ɡeɪmz kæn ˈɔːlsəʊ tiːʧ ˈvaɪtl ˈsəʊʃəl skɪlz/

analysis.purpose: Highlight benefits of sports beyond fitness

paragraphs.text: None can be enjoyed without abiding by the rules.
paragraphs.ipa: /nʌn kæn biː ɪnˈʤɔɪd wɪˈðaʊt əˈbaɪdɪŋ baɪ ðə ruːlz/

paragraphs.text: And no team can hope to succeed without cooperation between the players.
paragraphs.ipa: /ænd nəʊ tiːm kæn həʊp tuː səkˈsiːd wɪˈðaʊt kəʊˌɒpəˈreɪʃən bɪˈtwiːn ðə ˈpleɪəz/

paragraphs.text: This sort of positive team spirit can benefit communities, companies and enterprises and all kinds.
paragraphs.ipa: /ðɪs sɔːt əv ˈpɒzətɪv tiːm ˈspɪrɪt kæn ˈbɛnɪfɪt kəˈmjuːnɪtiz, ˈkʌmpəniz ænd ˈɛntəpraɪzɪz ænd ɔːl kaɪndz/

paragraphs.text: As the success of recent Paralympics bear witness, I love the sport also has the power to help rehabilitate.
paragraphs.ipa: /æz ðə səkˈsɛs əv ˈriːsnt ˈpærəlɪmpɪks beə ˈwɪtnəs, aɪ lʌv ðə spɔːt ˈɔːlsəʊ hæz ðə ˈpaʊə tuː hɛlp ˌriːhəˈbɪlɪteɪt/

analysis.purpose: Acknowledge power of sports in healing

paragraphs.text: My name only has to think of the injured men and women of the armed forces to see how an interest in games and sport can speed recovery and renew a sense of purpose, enjoyment and comradeship.
paragraphs.ipa: /maɪ neɪm ˈəʊnli hæz tuː θɪŋk əv ði ˈɪnʤəd mɛn ænd ˈwɪmɪn əv ði ɑːmd ˈfɔːsɪz tuː siː haʊ ən ˈɪntrɪst ɪn ɡeɪmz ænd spɔːt kæn spiːd rɪˈkʌvəri ænd rɪˈnjuː ə sɛns əv ˈpɜːpəs, ɪnˈʤɔɪmənt ænd ˈkɒmrɪdʃɪp/

paragraphs.text: Right around the world, people gather to compete under standard rules and in most cases aspire to friendly rivalry.
paragraphs.ipa: /raɪt əˈraʊnd ðə wɜːld, ˈpiːpl ˈɡæðə tuː kəmˈpiːt ˈʌndə ˈstændəd ruːlz ænd ɪn məʊst ˈkeɪsɪz əsˈpaɪə tuː ˈfrɛndli ˈraɪvəlri/

paragraphs.text: Competitors know that to succeed they must respect their opponents.
paragraphs.ipa: /kəmˈpɛtɪtəz nəʊ ðæt tuː səkˈsiːd ðeɪ mʌst rɪsˈpɛkt ðeər əˈpəʊnənts/

paragraphs.text: Very often they like each other too.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈvɛri ˈɒfən ðeɪ laɪk iːʧ ˈʌðə tuː/

paragraphs.text: Sportsmen and women often speak of the enormous pride they have in representing their country, a sense of belonging to a wider family.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈspɔːtsmən ænd ˈwɪmɪn ˈɒfən spiːk əv ði ɪˈnɔːməs praɪd ðeɪ hæv ɪn ˌrɛprɪˈzɛntɪŋ ðeə ˈkʌntri, ə sɛns əv bɪˈlɒŋɪŋ tuː ə ˈwaɪdə ˈfæmɪli/

paragraphs.text: We see this vividly at the Commonwealth Games for example, which is known to many as the friendly games.
paragraphs.ipa: /wiː siː ðɪs ˈvɪvɪdli æt ðə ˈkɒmənwelθ ɡeɪmz fɔːr ɪɡˈzɑːmpl, wɪʧ ɪz nəʊn tuː ˈmɛni æz ðə ˈfrɛndli ɡeɪmz/

paragraphs.text: And where I am sure you have noticed that it is always the competitors from the smallest countries who receive the loudest cheers.
paragraphs.ipa: /ænd wɛər aɪ æm ʃʊə juː hæv ˈnəʊtɪst ðæt ɪt ɪz ˈɔːlweɪz ðə kəmˈpɛtɪtəz frɒm ðə ˈsmɔːlɪst ˈkʌntriz huː rɪˈsiːv ðə ˈlaʊdɪst ʧɪəz/

paragraphs.text: People are capable of belonging to many communities, including a religious faith.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈpiːpl ɑː ˈkeɪpəbl əv bɪˈlɒŋɪŋ tuː ˈmɛni kəˈmjuːnɪtiz, ɪnˈkluːdɪŋ ə rɪˈlɪʤəs feɪθ/

paragraphs.text: King James may not have anticipated quite how important sport and games would have become in promoting harmony and common interests.
paragraphs.ipa: /kɪŋ ʤeɪmz meɪ nɒt hæv ænˈtɪsɪpeɪtɪd kwaɪt haʊ ɪmˈpɔːtənt spɔːt ænd ɡeɪmz wʊd hæv bɪˈkʌm ɪn prəˈməʊtɪŋ ˈhɑːməni ænd ˈkɒmən ˈɪntrɪsts/

paragraphs.text: But from the scriptures in the Bible which bears his name, we know that nothing is more satisfying than the feeling of belonging to a group who are dedicated to helping each other.
paragraphs.ipa: /bʌt frɒm ðə ˈskrɪpʧəz ɪn ðə ˈbaɪbl wɪʧ beəz hɪz neɪm, wiː nəʊ ðæt ˈnʌθɪŋ ɪz mɔː ˈsætɪsfaɪɪŋ ðæn ðə ˈfiːlɪŋ əv bɪˈlɒŋɪŋ tuː ə ɡruːp huː ɑː ˈdɛdɪkeɪtɪd tuː ˈhɛlpɪŋ iːʧ ˈʌðə/

paragraphs.text: Therefore all things whatsoever you would that men should do to you, do you even so to them.
paragraphs.ipa: /ˈðeəfɔːr ɔːl θɪŋz ˌwɒtsəʊˈɛvə juː wʊd ðæt mɛn ʃʊd duː tuː juː, duː juː ˈiːvən səʊ tuː ðɛm/

paragraphs.text: I wish you and all those whom you love and care for a very happy Christmas.
paragraphs.ipa: /aɪ wɪʃ juː ænd ɔːl ðəʊz huːm juː lʌv ænd keə fɔːr ə ˈvɛri ˈhæpi ˈkrɪsməs/
